title: Aucassin and Nicolette
creator_credit: Lotte Reiniger, Guy Glover and ONF | NFB
brief_description: An animated medieval fantasy, a delightful silhouette film, with colour background by master German animator Lotte Reiniger. Set against a background of castles and forest with Renaissance style music this enchanting tale recounts the love story of Aucassin and Nicolette.
